info.title: VAHVA eArchive API
info.description:
* Reviewed by team on 23/08/2019
## Date formats
Date format is according to SFS-EN 28601 standard, which is very similar to ISO 8601 format. The format is strictly:
  * **yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz**
  * example: 2019-05-03T12:17:00+03:00
  
  When passing date values in URL query string you need to encode the value. **The plus sign in timezone will not work as it will interpreted as space, so you need to encode it to %2B.**
## Updates
* Marked unsupported fields as deprecated, will be removed/refined later / Tero Arvola 2020-02-12
* Updated implementation status, date formats, removed faulty required fields / Tero Arvola 2020-02-18
* Fixed faulty error codes from 405 to 400 / Tero Arvola 2020-02-19
* Updated implementation status and did minor fixes / Tero Arvola 2020-02-20
* Fixed Cases and Records query parameters descriptions / Tero Arvola 2020-03-02
* Fixed RestrictionInfo.Owners format / Tero Arvola 2020-04-09
* Added IncludeRecords and IncludeActionDetails for GET Cases / Tero Arvola 2020-04-30

get.summary: Return single case by technical id. with Task / Record / Document metadata information. Note that Document contents still need to be fetched by GET /api/v1/documents/{documentRecno}

parameters.name: caseRecno
parameters.description: Case.recno of the case

parameters.name: idType
parameters.description: Type of case Id, by default vahvaRecno

parameters.name: returnClassificationScheme
parameters.description: Whether to return classification scheme or not. Defaults to false. It is assumed that the whole classification scheme is only used when archiving, in normal use classificationCode suffices. NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE

parameters.name: includeRecords
parameters.description: Whether to include simple Record list in results. Defaults to true. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: includeActionDetails
parameters.description: Whether to include Action and Record details in results. Defaults to true. NOT IMPLEMENTED

get.summary: Return cases based on search criteria.
get.description:
Note that this operation ONLY RETURNS CASE INFORMATION - no tasks, records or documents are returned to ensure proper performance. Further information can then be fetched by case using GET /api/v1/cases/{caseRecno}. Results are always returned in recno order, that is, by creation timestamp. By default the set is in ascending order, but parameter reverseSortOrder can be used to change the order to descending.
The following sanity checks are conducted on search criteria, breaking these rules will result in 400 return code with description. If effect, the API allow searching cases at maximum one year at a time, and is always limited by some search criteria.
* at least CaseNumber or Ministry is required
* for any date parameter, to and from dates (if both given) may not be further than one year apart
* for any date parameter, if to date is given alone, it may not be in the future

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Case.Description. Returns results that match the case description. Use '%' as wildcard. Default is empty. If given, needs to be at least 3 characters long.

parameters.name: ministry
parameters.description: Ministry abbreviation to search on. Results are filtered by given ministry. Defaults to empty. Either contact or ministry must be provided.

parameters.name: caseNumber
parameters.description: Case number of the case (ImportedCaseNumber).

parameters.name: classificationCodes
parameters.description: List of Case.ToClassificationCodes. Results are filtered by given classification codes. Default is empty. NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE

parameters.name: otherId
parameters.description: OtherIds of the Case. NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE

parameters.name: otherIdType
parameters.description: OtherId type. Can be EduskuntaTunnus, VahvaRecno or CaseNumber. There need to be exactly as many otherId as there are otherIdType fields. NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Limit to contacts in this/these role(s). Defaults to empty.

parameters.name: contact
parameters.description: List of contact technical id:s (recno) allowed. Results are filtered by given contacts. Defaults to empty. Can be limited to certain role(s) with "role" parameter.

parameters.name: subOrganizationOk
parameters.description:
When searching with organization contacts, if set to true, then we have a hit if case's owning organizaton
is a suborganization of a contact listed in parameter "contact". That is, we can search with LVM
recno, and all LVM sub-units would be considered a hit. In effect, this expands the list of contact
recnos in search criteria to all sub-organizations. Defaults to false. (NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE)

parameters.name: caseStatus
parameters.description:
List of case statuses allowed (according to coded value caseStatus). Results are filtered by given status codes.
Defaults to empty. Note: eArchive only has closed cases (caseStatus = 18)

parameters.name: modificationDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose modification timestamp is later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded.

parameters.name: modificationDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose modification timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded.

parameters.name: creationDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose creation timestamp later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded.

parameters.name: creationDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose creation timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded.

parameters.name: issuedDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose issued timestamp later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: issuedDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose issued timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: sentDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose sent timestamp later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: sentDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose sent timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: availableDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose available timestamp later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: availableDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose available timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: acquiredDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose acquired timestamp later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: acquiredDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose acquired timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: includeCaseReferences
parameters.description: Whether to include case-case references. Defaults to false. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: includeCustomMetadata
parameters.description: Whether to include custom metadata. Defaults to false. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: includeRecords
parameters.description: Whether to include simple Record list in results. Defaults to false. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: includeActionDetails
parameters.description: Whether to include Action and Record details in results. Defaults to false. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: publicOnly
parameters.description: Whether to to return publishable information only. Defaults to false. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: returnClassificationScheme
parameters.description: Whether to return classification scheme or not. Defaults to false. It is assumed that the whole classification scheme is only used when archiving, in normal use classificationCode suffices. NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number. Paging based on maxRows parameter below.

parameters.name: maxRows
parameters.description: Page size. Defaults to 100. Used as LIMIT in database search. If value is less than 1 or greated than 1000, a 400 with "The allowed values of maxRows are integer values between 1 and 1000" message is returned.

parameters.name: reverseSortOrder
parameters.description: Result set id by default ordered by recno ascending order. If true, result set will be ordered by recno descending order. By default false.

200.description: Cases requested. Note that only Case information is returned - no Task / Record / Document information is returned, although data model implies this.

400.description: Invalid input, such as wrong format of date-time object, unknown contact type or illegal combination of search criteria

get.summary: Return single record and its document metadata by technical id. Note that document contents are not returned with this operation, they need to be fetched separate  with GET /api/v1/documents/{documentRecno}

parameters.name: recordRecno
parameters.description: Document.recno of the document

parameters.name: idType
parameters.description: Type of record Id, by default vahvaRecno

get.summary: Return records based on search criteria. Returned cases are sorted by Record.recno, that is, by creation date.
get.description:
Note that this operation does not return document contents. This can be fetched by document using GET /api/v1/documents/{documentRecno}. By default the set is in ascending order, but parameter reverseSortOrder can be used to change the order to descending.
The following sanity checks are conducted on search criteria, breaking these rules will result in 400 return code with description. If effect, the API allow searching records at maximum one year at a time, and is always limited by some search criteria.
* at least Ministry or CaseId is required
* for any date parameter, to and from dates (if both given) may not be further than one year apart
* for any date parameter, if to date is given alone, it may not be in the future

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: Returns records of given case(s) identified by case id (not the same as recno which is technical id)

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Record.Title. Returns results that match record title. Use '%' as wildcard.  Defaults to empty. Needs to be at least 3 characters long.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Limit to contacts in this/these role(s). Defaults to empty.

parameters.name: otherId
parameters.description: OtherIds of the Record. NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE

parameters.name: otherIdType
parameters.description: OtherId type. Can be EduskuntaTunnus, VahvaRecno or RecordNumber. There need to be exactly as many otherId as there are otherIdType fields. NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE

parameters.name: contact
parameters.description:
List of contact technical id:s (recno) allowed. Results are filtered by given contacts.
Defaults to empty. Can be limited to certain role(s) with "role" parameter.

parameters.name: subOrganizationOk
parameters.description:
When searching with organization contacts, if set to true, then we have a hit if record's owning organizaton
is a suborganization of a contact listed in parameter "contact". That is, we can search with LVM
recno, and all LVM sub-units would be considered a hit. In effect, this expands the list of contact
recnos in search criteria to all sub-organizations. Defaults to false. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: recordStatus
parameters.description:
List of record statuses allowed (according to coded value recordStatus). Results are filtered by given status codes.
Defaults to empty. Note: eArchive only has records with status Completed (recordStatus = 7)

parameters.name: modificationDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose modification timestamp is later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded.

parameters.name: modificationDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose modification timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded.

parameters.name: creationDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose creation timestamp later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded.

parameters.name: creationDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose creation timestamp is earlier than this date. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded.

parameters.name: issuedDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose issued timestamp later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: issuedDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose issued timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: sentDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose sent timestamp later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: sentDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose sent timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: availableDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose available timestamp later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: availableDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose available timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: acquiredDateFrom
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose acquired timestamp later than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: acquiredDateTo
parameters.description: Limit results to those whose acquired timestamp is earlier than this timestamp. Default is empty. Date format is "yyyy-MM-ddThh:mm:sszzz". The value should be URL encoded. NOT IMPLEMENTED

parameters.name: includeCaseReferences
parameters.description: Whether to include document-case references. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: includeDocumentReferences
parameters.description: Whether to include document-document references. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: includeFiles
parameters.description: Whether to include files. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: includeCustomMetadata
parameters.description: Whether to include custom metadata. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: publicOnly
parameters.description: Whether to to return publishable information only. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page of the serch results. Default value is 0. Used with maxRows.

parameters.name: maxRows
parameters.description: Page size. Defaults to 100. Used as LIMIT in database search. If value is less than 1 or greated than 1000, a 400 with "The allowed values of maxRows are integer values between 1 and 1000" message is returned.

parameters.name: reverseSortOrder
parameters.description: Result set id by default ordered by recno ascending order. If true, result set will be ordered by recno descending order. By default false.

200.description: Records requested, with document metadata (no document contents)

400.description: Invalid input, such as wrong format of date-time object, unknown contact type or illegal combination of search criteria

get.summary: Return single document and its contents by technical id

parameters.name: documentRecno
parameters.description: Document.recno of the document

parameters.name: idType
parameters.description: Type of record Id, by default vahvaRecno

200.description: Document requested, with document metadata and document contents

Error.description: Indicates that transaction was not completed, and the reason for this

classificationCode.description: Shorthand of the classification code, such as "03.02.01.01.00" NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE

systemName.description: JHS191 6.4 Tietojärjestelmä. The name of the information system used in the action (NOT IMPLEMENTED)

Action.description: SÄHKE2 5 Toimenpide. Note that there is no separate "Task" entity in P360. "Task" is actually two pieces of custom metadata in Document object, namely "Toimenpiteen nimeke" (such as "Kanslaiskirjeen vastaanottaminen" - SÄHKE2 5.3 ) and "Toimenpiteen tyyppi" (such as "06.04.07.00" - SÄHKE2 5.6). This has a number of consequences * Each Action only has one Record * There can be multiple Actions of the same action type in Case * Some Action data is actually Record data (such as agent) * Only mandatory SÄHKE2 fields are used

Function.description: SÄHKE2 2.13 Tehtävä. Deprecated, use FunctionCode instead.

Authenticity.description: SÄHKE2 4.2 Asiakirjan alkuperäisyys ja eheys todettu (NOT IMPLEMENTED)

hasRedaction.description: SÄHKE2 4.8.5 Julkinen ("mustattu") versio/Salassa pidettävää tietoa sisältävä versio (NOT IMPLEMENTED)

isRedactionOf.description: SÄHKE2 4.8.5 Julkinen ("mustattu") versio/Salassa pidettävää tietoa sisältävä versio (NOT IMPLEMENTED)

useType.description:
useType:
 * `Arkisto` - Arkistomuoto
 * `Natiivi` - Asiakirjan alkuperäinen muoto
 * `Julkaisu` - Asiakirjan julkaisumuoto

Description.description: Keyword description (URI if imported from ontology)

Keyword.description: Keyword object (NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE)

ClassificationScheme.description: NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE

SubFunction.description: NOT IMPLEMENTED - NOT AVAILABLE IN EARCHIVE

PublicityClass.description:
SÄHKE2 2.6.1 Julkisuusluokka (Restriction.PublicityClass) - with addition of "Ei-julkinen" from JHS191.
The latter is used to indicate situation in which publicity is not public for some time, but will change
to public later on (see PublicityClassChange)
* Julkinen = Public
* Osittain salassa pidettävä = Partly confidential
* Salassa pidettävä = Confidential
* Ei-julkinen = Not public for the time being, will change into public later

PublicityClassChange.description:
JHS191 7.17 Julkisuusluokan muutos - the action triggering change in publicity class. Example values from VNK
TODO selvitä oikea koodaus esimerkkiin
* "Asian ratkaisu" = triggered upon case closure
* "Päätöksenteko" = triggerd upon decision
* "Päätöksen allekirjoitus" = triggered when decision has been signed

ProtectionLevel.description:
SÄHKE2 Metatietomalli: 2.6.5 Suojaustaso (Restriction.ProtectionLevel)
See [Julkisuuslaki 9§](https://www.finlex.fi/fi/laki/ajantasa/2010/20100681) 
* I = Protection level 1, unauthorized access can cause great damage to public interests
* II = Protection level 2, unauthorized access can cause significant damage to public interests
* III = Protection level 2, unauthorized access can cause damage to public or private interests
* IV = Protection level 4, unauthorized access can cause some harm to public or private interests

SecurityClass.description:
NOT IMPLEMENTED |
SÄHKE2 2.6.6 Turvallisuusluokka (Restriction.SecurityClass)
* Turvallisuusluokka I - TOP SECRET
* Turvallisuusluokka II - SECRET
* Turvallisuusluokka III - CONFIDENTIAL
* Turvallisuusluokka IV - RESTRICTED
* Ei turvallisuusluokiteltu - NOT CLASSIFIED

PersonalDataNature.description:
SÄHKE2 2.6.7 Henkilötietoja. Indicates whether personal data, or possibly sensitive personal data, is involved. Coded as follows (yes, strings in Finnish)
* "Ei sisällä henkilötietoja" = does not contain personal information
* "Sisältää henkilötietoja" = contains personal information
* "Sisältää arkaluonteisia henkilötietoja" = contains sensitive personal information

RetentionPeriodCalculationGrounds.description:
JHS191 S.10 Säilytysajan laskentaperuste. Indicates what event is considered the start of retention perios calculation. Recommended codes are as follows, other codes are allowed
* "Asian lopullinen ratkaisu" = calculation start when the final decision in case has been done
* "Säilytysjärjestelmään siirto" = calculation starts from transfer to archiving system

SecurityPeriodCalculationGrounds.description: JHS191 5.4 Salassapidon laskentaperuste. Mandatory if not public.

otherIdType.description:
Koodiston "otherIdType" mukaiset vaihtoehdot. VNK-esimerkki
* vahvaDocumentNumber
* eduskuntaTunnus
* vahvaContactRecno
* hankeikkunaKohdeTunnus
* unspecified

Language.description:
SÄHKE2 2.4 Kieli, koodiston "language" mukaiset vaihtoehdot. VNK-esimerkki suomeksi
* 'fi' - suomi
* 'sv' - ruotsi
* 'en' - englanti
* 'fr' - ranska
* 'de' - saksa
* 'ru' - venäjä
* 'bg' - bulgaria
* 'et' - viro
* 'es' - espanja
* 'nl' - hollangi
* 'ga' - irlanti
* 'it' - italia
* 'el' - kreikka
* 'lv' - liettua
* 'mt' - malta
* 'pl' - puola
* 'ro' - romania
* 'sk' - slovakia
* 'sl' - slovenia
* 'da' - tanska
* 'cs' - tsekki
* 'se' - pohjois-aame

SÄHKE2 2.12 (asian) Tila, koodiston "caseStatus" mukaiset vaihtoehdot. VNK-esimerkki suojmeksi

ActionType.description: SÄHKE2 5.6 (toimenpiteen) Tyyppi. Stored in TOS. Not a coded value.

CaseType.description: SÄHKE2 2.15 (asian) Tyyppi. Koodiston "caseType" mukainen kooditus TODO selvitä oikea koodaus esimerkkiin (NOT IMPLEMENTED)
